text: aur nishchay hee tum usee prakaar ek-ek karake hamaare paas aa gae, jis prakaar hamane tumhen pahalee baar paida kiya tha. aur jo kuchh hamane tumhen de rakha tha, use apane peechhe chhod aae aur ham tumhaare saath tumhaare un sifaarishiyon ko bhee nahin dekh rahe hain, jinake vishay mein tum daave se kahate the, "ve tumhaare maamale mein shareek hai." tumhaare paarasparik sambandh toot chuke hai aur ve sab tumase gum hokar rah gae, jo daave tum kiya karate the
